mapper.select: select D.msg_no,E.emp_no,E.user_id,E.emp_name,E.emp_image,D.to_id,D.from_id,D.msg_content,D.msg_date from emp_tb E left join dm_tb D on E.emp_no = D.emp_no where ((D.to_id = #{toId} and D.from_id = #{fromId}) OR (D.to_id = #{fromId} and D.from_id = #{toId})) and D.msg_no > (select max(D.msg_no) - ${msgNo} from dm_tb) order by D.msg_date
select * from emp_tb E left join dm_tb D on E.emp_no = D.emp_no where D.msg_no = (select max(msg_no) from dm_tb where from_id = #{toId})
